title: Park and Picnic Areas with Barbecue Grills, 2 Car Attached Garage
map_address: 1108 Legacy Drive near W. Pfennig Lane
posting_body: We are now offering in person tours Monday-Saturday.
Contact us today to schedule a tour!
The luxury doesn’t stop when you leave your front door.
Our Pflugerville homes offer many community amenities for you to pamper yourself with.
Relax and visit the clubhouse, or take a cool and refreshing dip in the sparkling swimming pool while catching some daytime rays on the pool deck.
We are a pet-friendly community so bring your furry friends along.
For your active lifestyle, we also have a state-of-the-art fitness center.
Call us today and make an appointment and see why Legacy Rental Homes is the perfect place for you to call home.
Want more information on this unit?
This is a 4 Bedroom, 2.5 Bath, approximately 1882 Sq.
- White Speckled or Slate Grey Quartz Countertops
- Stainless Steel Whirlpool Energy Efficient Appliances
- Farm White or Trendy Grey Cabinetry
- Front Yard and Fenced Private Back Yards
- Amenity Center and Clubhouse with Wi-Fi
- Park and Picnic Areas with Barbecue Grills
